4650.verse: وَنُفِخَ|And will be blown|134|143|11032$فِى|[in]|48|66|89$ٱلصُّورِ‌ۚ|the trumpet.|104|122|5734$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|82|28$يَوْمُ|(is the) Day|99|117|5399$ٱلْوَعِيدِ|(of) the Warning.|135|144|11648$

4665.verse: lahum⚓For them⚓PRON|3MP★m~aA⚓whatever⚓ REL|LEM:maA★ya$aA^'uwna⚓they wish⚓ V|IMPF|LEM:$aA^'a|ROOT:$yA|3MP★fiyhaA⚓therein⚓ P|LEM:fiY★waladayonaA⚓and with Us⚓ LOC|LEM:laday★maziydN⚓(is) more.⚓ N|PASS|PCPL|LEM:m~aziyd|ROOT:zyd|M|INDEF|NOM★

4646.verse: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

4647.verse: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.

4648.verse: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

4649.verse: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

4650.verse: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

4651.verse: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

4652.verse: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

4653.verse: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

4654.verse: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

4655.verse: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

4656.verse: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

4657.verse: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

4658.verse: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.

4659.verse: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

4660.verse: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

4661.verse: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

4662.verse: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

4663.verse: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

4664.verse: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

4665.verse: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.
